summary: When a chemical warfare leaves the world barren and filled with mutated monsters, a band of survivors in a underground complex battles one of the creatures who was able to break in.
cast: George Kennedy|Andrew Stevens|Starr Andreeff|Terri Treas|John Lafayette|Tommy Hinkley|Yvonne Saa|Joseph Hardin|Al Guarino|Jack van Landingham|Joal Corso|Butch Stevens
